titles.title: Recognizing the longstanding partnership between USDA and NASA and encouraging further interagency collaboration.
Recognizing the longstanding partnership between USDA and NASA and encouraging further interagency collaboration.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Research, and Biotechnology.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the partnership between the United States Department of Agriculture and the National Aeronautics and Space Administration with respect to agricultural and other research.
